heroHeadline: SZUMAR Developments - Contemporary Costa Blanca Living
heroIntro:
SZUMAR represents a focused approach to coastal property development, with carefully considered projects designed for those seeking quality new builds in established areas. We're currently showcasing one exceptional property from their Alba Salina 3 Montesinos development, located in the peaceful coastal zone of La Herrada.

This single listing represents SZUMAR's commitment to creating homes that complement their surroundings while offering modern living standards. La Herrada has become increasingly popular among buyers seeking authentic Costa Blanca living away from overcrowded tourist zones, and SZUMAR's offering here reflects that demand perfectly.

aboutSection.title: About SZUMAR
aboutSection.content:
SZUMAR focuses on residential developments that blend contemporary design with practical living. Their approach emphasizes location selection and thoughtful execution rather than rapid expansion across multiple projects.

The developer understands that Costa Blanca buyers value both quality construction and community integration. Their work in La Herrada demonstrates this philosophy, creating properties that serve as genuine residences rather than pure investment vehicles.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: SZUMAR specializes in manageable residential developments positioned in strategically chosen coastal locations. Rather than sprawling megaprojects, they concentrate on areas with genuine appeal and established infrastructure. La Herrada represents their current focusâ€”a quieter alternative to busier coastal settlements, yet with full access to Costa Blanca amenities. Their Alba Salina 3 Montesinos project brings thoughtful residential design to this increasingly desirable zone.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
features: Modern building standards and contemporary finishes
Practical amenities suited to coastal living
qualitySection.content: SZUMAR's Alba Salina 3 Montesinos project reflects current building standards for the Costa Blanca region, combining practical design with quality execution. Properties are built to provide genuine comfort for full-time residents and seasonal users alike. The development incorporates efficient use of space and materials, ensuring homes perform well in the Mediterranean climate while maintaining modern living expectations.

reasons.title: Selective Development Approach
reasons.description: SZUMAR prioritizes quality over quantity, focusing on projects in genuinely desirable locations rather than pursuing every opportunity.

reasons.title: Strategic Location in La Herrada
reasons.description: Their presence in La Herrada provides access to an increasingly appreciated coastal area that balances tranquility with convenience.

reasons.title: Practical Design Philosophy
reasons.description: Properties are designed for real living, with layouts and features that work for both permanent residents and vacation users.

faqs.question: Where are SZUMAR properties located?
faqs.answer: SZUMAR's current offering is located in La Herrada, a peaceful Costa Blanca South coastal zone. Their Alba Salina 3 Montesinos development provides an alternative to busier resort areas while maintaining excellent connectivity.

faqs.question: What type of properties does SZUMAR develop?
faqs.answer: SZUMAR develops residential units including apartments and townhouses designed for both full-time living and holiday use, with emphasis on practical layouts and modern specifications.

faqs.question: Is the Alba Salina 3 Montesinos development completed?
faqs.answer: We recommend contacting us directly for current status and availability of specific units in the Alba Salina 3 Montesinos project. Completion timelines vary, and we can provide detailed information about the property we're showcasing.

conclusion: SZUMAR's focused approach to coastal development has created genuine opportunities in La Herrada's emerging market. Browse our available listing from the Alba Salina 3 Montesinos development today, and discover whether this property aligns with your Costa Blanca lifestyle goals.
